Steps to Reproduce: 1. Navigate to Home Page. 2. Click 'Signup / Login' link. 3. Under 'New User Signup!', enter Name: `Test User New` and unique Email: `testuser[timestamp]@example.com`. 4. Click 'Signup'. 5. Fill all account information (Title, Password, Date of Birth, Name fields). 6. Fill all address information (First/Last Name, Company, Address, Country, State, City, Zipcode, Mobile Number). 7. Click 'Create Account' button.
Expected Result: 'ACCOUNT CREATED!' page is displayed. Clicking 'Continue' redirects to Home page, showing 'Logged in as Test User New'.

Steps to Reproduce: 1. Navigate to Home Page. 2. Click 'Signup / Login' link.
Expected Result: The 'Login to your account' form with Email Address and Password fields, and 'Login' button is clearly visible.

Steps to Reproduce: 1. Navigate to Home Page. 2. Click 'Signup / Login' link. 3. Proceed to account creation form.
Expected Result: If a 'Terms & Conditions' checkbox exists, it should be clickable and allow progression upon selection. (Check if applicable on site)
